title: Hipster Lux? Maybe...?
body:
Just drew up a little something...

replies.body: thanks :3 just came back to this

She needs tats.

Not sure what though, full sleeve, tramp stamp, symmetric collar bone birds?
Beautiful! :) I especially love the nose shape and the hair details...have you considered expanding on this design? I would love to see a full skin concept!
